{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15636v1", "title": "Contracting elements and conjugacy growth in Coxeter groups, graph
  products, and further groups", "summary": "In this article we construct contracting elements in the standard Cayley
graphs of the so-called periagroups, a family of groups introduced by the
second-named author which include Coxeter groups, graph products, and Dyer
groups. As a consequence, we deduce that, unless they virtually split as direct
products, periagroups are acylindrically hyperbolic and their conjugacy growth
series, with respect to standard generating sets, are transcendental.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,math.CO,math.MG", "published": "2025-04-22T06:56:05Z"}
